globalEvents.name: Open Crate 1
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
You emerge from the twisted ruins of your ship and survey the bright, desolate landscape of the Dune Sea around you. Sand burns out to the horizon. The pilot repeatedly attempts to contact Alliance Command, but with no success.

“Stormtroopers approaching from the west!” one of your companions shouts, looking through his macrobinoculars. You clutch the weapon at your side.

A scout atop the wreckage points and calls down, “They're coming from that small base. We need to stop them at the source or we'll be overrun.” She turns to you. “We can hold our own here. You get to that base and shut it down!”

You scramble to gather your gear and help set up a defensive perimeter. You say a hurried goodbye to your friends and family still huddled inside the wreckage. They urge you to stay, but you assure them that you're acting for their safety.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} Doors are locked to Imperial figures.

eventActions.theText: As you approach the base, keeping a wide berth from the stormtrooper patrol, your walk picks up to a jog. Nearing the outer perimeter, you hear the sounds of battle erupt from behind you as the base's garrison emerges to meet you, blasters raised.
The perimeter of the base consists of what was once a sturdy metal fence. Years in the desert climate have worn it down.

entityProperties.name: Barricade 1
entityProperties.theText:
The Imperial barricade was once a sturdy fence, fortified by sand bags. It is worn down by the desert climate.

{-} The neutral mission tokens represent a barricade, A Rebel figure can attack the barricade (Health: 4, Defense: 1 {G}). The barricade blocks movement, line of sight, adjacency, and counting spaces.

eventActions.theText:
{-} The neutral mission tokens represent a barricade, A Rebel figure can attack the barricade (Health: 4, Defense: 1 {G}). The barricade blocks movement, line of sight, adjacency, and counting spaces.
{-} The mission will progress when the barricade is destroyed.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 6, or when all heroes are wounded.
The base is guarded by Imperial forces.

{-} The neutral mission tokens represent a barricade, A Rebel figure can attack the barricade (Health: 4, Defense: 1 {G}). The barricade blocks movement, line of sight, adjacency, and counting spaces.
{-} The mission will progress when the barricade is destroyed.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 6, or when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
The power in the base flickers and fails as Captain Terro calls for his remaining forces to retreat. A second skiff lands outside the base, and the Weequay piloting it call to you, “You fought well. Your friends are safe for now; we have seen to that. The Great Jabba requests that you come with us.”

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Each hero receives 2 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

eventActions.theText:
You are taken through the gate of a massive palace where you are met by Bib Fortuna, Jabba's Twi'lek majordomo. "Chowbasa Ootmian," he says in his raspy voice, before slipping into Basic with a heavy dialect. “Jabba the Hutt has a deal to present for you. He has provided safe harbor for your family and friends, In return, you will lend your unique abilities to aid in various jobs as he requires. If this arrangement works out to everyone’s pleasing, Jabba promises his protection to you and your companions while you remain on Tatooine.” He then signals to the Weequay, who escort you to your new barracks for some rest.

{-} Place Story Mission cards "Overcharged" and "Hostile Negotiations" into play.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
Flames and blaster bolts nip at your heels as you retreat from the base. You look up to see a second skiff zooming in above you. Its Weequay pilot calls down to you, “We can take you to Jabba and keep your friends safe if you come with us, unless you wish to continue trying your luck with the Empire.” You grab the ladder and scramble up to the ship as it blasts across the Dune Sea.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

eventActions.theText:
You are taken through the gate of a massive palace where you are met by Bib Fortuna, Jabba's Twi'lek majordomo. "Chowbasa Ootmian," he says in his raspy voice, before slipping into Basic with a heavy dialect. “Jabba the Hutt has a deal to present for you. He has provided safe harbor for your family and friends, In return, you will lend your unique abilities to aid in various jobs as he requires. If this arrangement works out to everyone’s pleasing, Jabba promises his protection to you and your companions while you remain on Tatooine.” He then signals to the Weequay, who escort you to your new barracks for some rest.

{-} Place Story Mission cards "Overcharged" and "Hostile Negotiations" into play.

globalEvents.name: Barricade destroyed
globalEvents.eventText:
The fence collapses into a mess of scorched metal bars. Imperials continue to run out ahead of you.

{-} The mission will progress when the door opens.

entityProperties.name: Door
entityProperties.theText:
The door to the command post is weathered by the heat and the sand.

{-} The door is locked to Imperial figures.

eventActions.theText: You're overwhelmed by a rush of sound as a sand skiff piloted by Weequay mercenaries lands to flank you.
The Weequay raise their blasters in their leathery hands. “You're trespassing on Jabba’s sand. You're not welcome." They snarl as they aim their rifles at the stormtroopers.

eventActions.abilities: Raider: While attacking, you may choose 1 die. The player that rolled that die must reroll that die.

eventActions.theText:
{-} The mission will progress when the door opens.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 6, or when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: The Captain's Squad
globalEvents.eventText: You open the blast door to the base’s main hangar and are met with a cacophony of chatter and shouts through the filter of stormtrooper helmets.

entityProperties.name: Door
entityProperties.theText:
The door to the command post is weathered by the heat and the sand.

{-} The door is locked to Imperial figures.

eventActions.theText:
Stormtroopers: Be adjacent to the terminal.
{-} All others: Block access to the terminal.

The stormtrooper commander turns to face you on his dewback mount, fire spurting from his flamethrower. "Defensive formation, men! Shoot them down!"

They respond, “Yes, sir, Captain Terro, sir", taking aim.
The command post's security console is installed in a corner nearby. If you sabotage the base, you might be able to get all the stranded people to safety.

entityProperties.name: Terminal
entityProperties.theText:
The command post's security console controls all the central systems.

{-} A hero can interact with the terminal to sabotage the base.
{-} Heroes cannot interact with the terminal while there is at least 1 Stormtrooper adjacent to it.

eventActions.theText:

{-} The Rebels win when the base is sabotaged.
